verses.roman:
puḍila sakala dāḍi, mukhe haila vraṇa
yei peyādā yāya, tāra ei vivaraṇa

synonyms: puḍila—burned; sakala—all; dāḍi—beard; mukhe—on the face; haila—there was; vraṇa—blisters; yei—any; peyādā—orderly; yāya—goes; tāra—his; ei—this; vivaraṇa—description.
translation: " 'My beard was burned, and there were blisters on my cheeks.' Every orderly who went gave the same description.
